name: Holiday Catch - Summer
description:
HOLIDAY CATCH - SUMMER is a catch it game, catching the ice creams and ice lollies and avoiding the wasps.  How many can you catch before the time runs out.  Things gets faster the longer your survive.  Share your best score with your friends.  Original graphics and cool sounds and music.  Simple controls, just tap to move left/right or drag the character.

FEATURES:

🦩 Animated character to play as. 
🎵 Cool sound effects and music.
🕹️ Simple controls.
😲 The game gets harder the longer you survive.
💯 Share your best score and compete with friends.

DEVICE/CONTENT INFO:

🔹 Works on phones, tablets and Chromebooks (that support Android).
🔹 Small download size.
🔹 No notifications.
🔹 No in-app purchases.
🔹 No banner adverts distracting you during gameplay.
🔹 No permissions requested.
🔹 No personal data recorded or used.
🔹 No violent content, bad language or inappropriate adverts.

🆓 Holiday Catch - Summer is a 100% free catch it game and always will be, so download it today and get catching. 🆓

Please leave a rating in the playstore with your feedback.

If you like this game, please check out the other free games by Scaly Bob.
